<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Send a payment request"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/2.0/portal/payment/request"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Sends a request for the portal payment.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["email","message"],"type":"object","properties":{"userName":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the user submitting the sales request.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"},"email":{"type":"string","description":"The contact email address for the sales inquiry.","nullable":true,"example":"Sydney_Roberts4@hotmail.com"},"message":{"type":"string","description":"The details of the sales inquiry or payment request.","nullable":true,"example":"some text"}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for handling sales and payment inquiries in the portal.","title":"SalesRequestsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Ok"},"400":{"description":"Incorrect email or message text is empty"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"429":{"description":"Request limit is exceeded"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
